category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 38 (Report of Disciplinary Action)
contents: Article 38 (Report of Disciplinary Action) Pursuant to Article 33, matters on which disciplinary action has been resolved by the event committee or city/provincial committee shall be reported to the Sports Council without delay, and matters on which disciplinary action has been resolved by the city/provincial sports organization and city/county/district sports council committee shall be reported without delay. City/provincial committees report on matters. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
